title: Burger Tablet//Emailing the Queen of Apes
description:
Geoff, Gavin, and Andrew talk about a Microsoft Surface contest, a stolen Battle Bus, a whole new genre of entertainment, and movie theater stories.
Sponsored by Mack Weldon. For 20% off your first order, visit http://mackweldon.com/face and enter promo code face.
